animesocialistparty 162196450373 "2017-06-24 11:15:35 GMT" https://animesocialistparty.tumblr.com/post/162196450373/morbid-inequality-now-just-six-men-have-as-much "marxferatu: entitledrichpeople:     Yes
column2: inequality is getting worse every year. In early 2016 Oxfam reported that just 62 individuals had the same wealth as the bottom half of humanity. About a year later Oxfam reported that just 8 men had the same wealth as the world’s bottom half. Based on the same methodology and data sources used by Oxfam
column3: that number is now down to 6.   …………   It’s not just the bottom half: A 500-seat auditorium could hold as much wealth as 70% of the world’s population.  According to the Forbes Billionaire List
column4: the world’s richest 500 individuals have $4.73 trillion in wealth. Tables 2-4 and 3-4 of the GWD reveal that the poorest seven deciles of the world population own just 1.86% of the $256 trillion in global wealth
column5: or $4.76 trillion. That’s over two-thirds of all the people on earth.     If you redistribute the wealth of the richest 6 men on Earth
column6: you could double the wealth of about 3.7 Billion of the worlds poorest people.  If you redistribute the wealth of just the 500 richest people
column7: you could double the wealth of about 5 Billion people.  There’s not a shortage of assets
column8: there’s an appropriation of assets by the bourgeoisie.  The question of where communists would get the resources for social programs we propose is not a hard one to answer when you start looking at where the wealth is right now.  Take that 98% of the global wealth owned by the richest 30% of the population and use it to provide a good living to everyone.  " False link

column1: animesocialistparty 162196114498 "2017-06-24 10:55:44 GMT" https://animesocialistparty.tumblr.com/post/162196114498/orwellian-canadians-can-now-be-fined-or-jailed "cutevictim:  lightningarmour:  allthecanadianpolitics:  charmanderriere:  slytherinlock:  charmanderriere:  dysphoria-privilege:  secret-knight:  roninart-tactical:  argangbang:  I’m thinking we might need 2 Walls.  Holy shit! Is this real? What timeline are we now?  Yikes  THIS ISN’T FUCKING TRUE.Bill C-16 added gender identity to Canada’s Bill of Human Rights. It means 1) transgender Canadians can now not be denied housing or employment because they are trans
column2: and 2) if a transgender Canadian is attacked or killed because they are trans
column3: the attacker can be charged with a hate crime.The bill makes no mention of pronoun use at all and the idea that it “criminilizes using the wrong pronouns” was popularized by Jordan Peterson
column4: a transphobic professor at U of T.  Could I have a source to verify this? I don’t know anything about Canadian law…   @allthecanadianpolitics has several
column5: my ref tag might also have some. I’m always on mobile so it’s hard to post links.  You can also try googling bill c-16 for the text of the bill
column6: and googling the Canadian Human Rights code / Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms. Can confirm
column7: THIS IS NOT TRUE. Stop spreading lies
column9: please. Some sources: Bill C-16 – No
column10: its Not about Criminalizing Pronoun Misuse Are Jordan Peterson’s Claims About Bill C-16 Correct? (No) No
column11: the Trans Rights Bill Doesn’t Criminalize Free Speech  I don’t remember the part in 1984 where Winston is arrested for misgendering somebody.  Canada: You can’t deny transgender people a place to live or
column13: murder them anymore. American right: What……the fuk….kind of….oreweilleon……….bullshit……………????!!!!!! " False link

column1: animesocialistparty 160365287788 "2017-05-06 10:59:24 GMT" https://animesocialistparty.tumblr.com/post/160365287788/cuba-says-no-to-transphobia-and-homophobia "thedemsocialist:  The 10th edition of the Cuban Assembly Against Homophobia and Transphobia event began Wednesday
column4: began with a presentation of an educational campaign titled “Me Included.” This year’s theme focuses on homophobic and/or transphobic bullying at schools. “Why did we choose the school? Precisely because it is one of the most important institutions in society
column6: director of the National Center for Sexual Education
column7: CENESEX. Just because Cuba has a fairly low level of occurrence of these types of social ills (transphobia and homophobia)
column11: but also the qualitative aspect of our life experiences. This type of discriminatory behavior is very harmful. Our campaign is not based on the fact that homophobia and transphobia are big problems
column12: but because they exist and there’s no awareness of it.” " False link
